reviewText: I've been communicating with the Angels for years now.  Interestingly enough I find that this video presents  similar steps. It's great for the beginner.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This video is a pretty straight forward synopsis of how to make contact with the spirit world or your higher self.  Having used these techniques in the past I was curious to see how different Mr. Murray's approach was than my own.  To my surprise it was pretty close.This video itself was average as far as production and layout.  Some of the scenes were just script being read aloud by a random voice and then some of the scenes were just words on the screen.  However, the video gives what it states, "Step by Step" instruction on how to call in Guides and Angels.A better scenario in regards to these techniques would be personal instruction by a live teacher, where they can check you progress and answer questions along the way, however I found this to be a great straight forward "how to" on the subject with very little fluff.Definitely a good starter video or review for those who practice.  Personally, I'd rather see more "how to" videos like this for a variety of subjects, pertaining to metaphysical studies.  Maybe Mr. Murray will oblige us.4 Stars - a good add to the home library.More on my work please click here:The Master Within
summary: Break on Through to the Other Side

reviewText: This is another one of Steve Murray's programs that I tried. It is a fantastic video and truly shows you how to make spiritual connections without being overly complicated. One of the things I enjoy about Mr. Murray is that he does not have a lot of fluff around his programs; they are simple, easy to do, to the point and they work. I also have the Spiritual Contact Volume 2 DVD that I purchased from Steve's site... it too is a worth while purchase for anyone interested in this subject.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is a great step-by-step DVD.  Steve Murray does a wonderful job telling you just what to do and how to do it. This has always been an interest of mine, but I have never been able to find any information on the topic that didn't sound like just so much hokus pokus!. Steve Murray presents the information in a very straight forward manner, answered any questions I ever had and described a procedure that is easy to follow. Since, viewing the DVD, I have felt the presence of my departed father more than ever, in fact I have always heard that pennys will suddenly appear from nowhere if someone departed wants you to be aware they are with you, I mention this because since viewing the DVD three weeks ago,  2 days ago a penny literally fell down on me from the bathroom ceiling as I was combing my hair, I thanked my Dad, and then I thanked Steve Murray for the DVD!.

reviewText: This is different then Steve Murray's other Reiki DVD's on becoming a Reiki 1, 2 or Master - or his books that really are the best Reiki Guides out there. This is different and I feel it helps set the stage for Reiki work, helping you learn to open up to Spirit and Guidance for your healing sessions. But, even if your not interested in Reiki, this DVD shows you step by step how to contact the other side, it's beautifully put together and he doesn't hold anything back. It's a must for any one who wishes to reach the other side and needs information on how to do it in a safe way.I've enjoyed these programs and I truly believe I was brought to them via"Divine intervention" which paved the way for me to find what I was searching for... Whatever you decide in your search for Reiki or Spirit Connact may the Universal Life Force energy grace your path...
Title: N/A

reviewText: I say wonderful because Steve's connection and honestly open way of engaging you to this wonderful way of communicating is truly a gift within this DVD.  And I say simple because it's not full of information and/or technical avenues to achieve your own spirit communication.  So many "Psychic" books make you feel as if THEY have the "power" and you don't.  Steve doesn't do that and you'll leave this video feeling empowered to do it yourself.  His step by step teaching method works on so many levels, from reading it onscreen to following along as he does it himself.  If you are a seasoned pro - then you may simply watch for the connection of yet another "way" to add upon your divination tools.  Nothing but support from a fellow psychic/healer to gain.  If you are just starting out - this DVD is a wonderful first item to put into your divination 'toolbox' to use over and over again.
summary: A wonderful & simple way to get started...
Title: N/A

reviewText: This video was 30 min & drawn out as much as possible by Steve Murray, for that I take off 1 star. With being so short, he also doesn't get bogged down in religions & tries to not go to any one denomination.You have to find your own ways to relax to that state between asleep & awake to feel the other planes of reality as strongly as you do this logical one. I use strong music while others may need silence.He does make sure you do say a prayer of words stating you only wish to get info for your highest good. There is debate whether there are spirits who can hurt you.No one needs really any items or talismans or anything unless you need something to concentrate on so you don't get distracted. That's why Ouiji boards work, it's not the wood or plastic, it's you opening yourself up to anything on another plane & using the board to focus.I have had many visions myself during massage & Reiki sessions of patients former friends & relatives from the other side, as it's also true for me that, yes, they do retain their sense of humor & quirks or at least as to help to be identified if they so wish to.If you liked DVDs best, this is a good starting point, but the info can be summed up in about 15-20 pages of a book probably.No, there is no info about the other side & yes, everyone has been born with the ability to tap into the universe for help & answers to their lives & those that are no longer living.It's all a matter of not CONSTANTLY either second guessing what you sense/feel, or doubting you have any ability.Take off 2 stars if you were really expecting in depth info.
summary: Basic Intro to not be afraid to be a part of the universe
